title: CISA Reports PRC Hackers Using BRICKSTORM for Long-Term Access in U.S. Systems
description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) on Thursday released details of a backdoor named BRICKSTORM that has been put to use by state-sponsored threat actors from the People's Republic of China (PRC) to maintain long-term persistence …
